State or area: SOURCE: Social Security Administration, Master Beneficiary Record, 100 percent data.
Retired workers: NOTES: Because of differences in data sources and calculation methods, statistics reported in this table may differ from those reported by the Office of the Chief Actuary.
Disabled workers: Totals do not necessarily equal the sum of rounded components.
Number: a. Benefits awarded before the December cost-of-living increase are converted to the December rates before averages are computed.
Percent: b. Includes American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, U.S. Virgin Islands, and foreign countries.
